description:
At night Kyou is frightened by the weird sound of a voice - is that the spirit of a dead girl? Asu-chan bravely supporting and encouraging her older sister enables Kyou to go back to sleep.
At school Asu is once again helping her classmates, getting praised for being good in everything. But actually Asu has a problem: She can`t sing, the music test at school is only a couple of days away, and all her friends at school expect her to sing as well as she`s performing in all other classes. At home she begins to practice her song for the test but soon becomes frustrated... then suddenly she hears a wonderful voice from outside continue her song.

titles.title: A Day of Guitars, Dreams and a Music Teacher
Guitar to Yume to Uta no Sensei no Hi
Um dia de guitarras, sonhos e um professor de música
ギターと夢と歌の先生の日
